meanings.definition: To give structure or organization to something.
meanings.sent1: She structuralizes her daily routine by making a to-do list every morning.
meanings.sent2: The architect structuralizes the building plans before starting the construction.
meanings.sent3: The teacher structuralizes the classroom seating arrangement to keep the students engaged.
meanings.sent4: His leadership structuralizes the team, making them more efficient and productive.
meanings.sent5: The chef structuralizes the ingredients in a way that enhances the flavors of the dish.

meanings.definition: To arrange or form into a structure.
meanings.sent1: He carefully structuralizes the blocks to build a sturdy tower.
meanings.sent2: The artist structuralizes the clay into a beautiful sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The child structuralizes the toy blocks into a mini city.
meanings.sent4: The designer structuralizes the fabric to create a unique dress.
meanings.sent5: The gardener structuralizes the plants in the garden for a harmonious layout.
